xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 15 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 06:08 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 06:32 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:18 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:22 <ravigarg27_> has joined #ccm 09:35 <ravigarg27_> hi sdumitriu, 09:38 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 09:55 <ravigarg27_> Hi sdumitriu1, 10:15 <sdumitriu1> Hi ravigarg27_ 10:34 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:34 <ravigarg27> Hey sdumitriu1, sorry had gone for dinner 10:35 <ravigarg27> The external resources now is running fine but it doesnt get initialised when I include dictionary lookup annotator 10:35 <ravigarg27> doesnt show any error too 10:36 <ravigarg27> also have given apt memory so that shudnt also be an issue 10:37 <sdumitriu1> Hi Ravi 10:37 <sdumitriu1> Well, I don't know what to say, there is no timeout set on the thread 10:38 <sdumitriu1> Did you try to debug it? 10:38 <sdumitriu1> See where it fails? 10:38 <sdumitriu1> I can't help you very much without seeing the code 10:38 <ravigarg27> yeah I tried that 10:38 <ravigarg27> If I dont include the dictionary one it work good 10:39 <ravigarg27> but after I include it it doesnt show up anything 10:39 <sdumitriu1> Note that you don't need to wait for the code to be perfect (or event functional) before you commit it 10:39 <sdumitriu1> One common way to commit work in progress is to create a feature branch and perform regular commits there 10:39 <sdumitriu1> This way, the code is available for the team to provide feedback, the master branch is not affected by half-done features, and the feature branch can be easily merged into the master one the implementation is stable 10:39 <ravigarg27> ok I will to that today itself 10:39 <sdumitriu1> Committing is not releasing 10:39 <sdumitriu1> You should commit very often 10:40 <sdumitriu1> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Release_early,_release_often 10:40 <ravigarg27> okay sure I will start from today itself 10:40 <sdumitriu1> Commit early, commit often 10:40 <sdumitriu1> I have to go for a short while, will be back soon 10:40 <ravigarg27> okay 11:47 <BogdanVancea1> has joined #ccm 12:00 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:21 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 13:55 <ravigarg27_> has joined #ccm 14:12 <ravigarg27_> hey sdumitru1, the resources in total are 73mb should I push them too? 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Push where? 14:13 <sdumitriu1> In the repo 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 14:13 <ravigarg27_> yeah 14:13 <sdumitriu1> Not sure 14:13 <sdumitriu1> They should be external resources 14:13 <ravigarg27_> yup 14:13 <sdumitriu1> In a different repo 14:17 <ravigarg27_> I need to make a branch in my forked repo right ? 14:18 <sdumitriu1> What for? 14:19 <ravigarg27_> you said a feature branch so I though of making a branch in my forked repo and then doing pull request 14:19 <sdumitriu1> Right 14:19 <ravigarg27_> sorry very new to github 14:19 <ravigarg27_> ohh okay 14:20 <sdumitriu1> Sorry, we were talking about the external resources right before, wasn't sure what was the branch for 14:22 <ravigarg27_> no its ok for now I will commit to this repo only I have reduced it to like 14-15 mb 14:23 <ravigarg27_> then later on whereever you say 14:23 <sdumitriu1> OK, that sounds reasonable 14:27 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 15:05 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm
